title: Hexxed Branch
summaries: The Hexxed Branch is a mount-summoning item which summons a rideable Tree Mount. It is dropped by the Mourning Wood in Master Mode with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. The Tree Mount is a ground-based mount; it is unable to fly. While traveling at full speed, enemies in its path will be hit by 120 base summon damage.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a rideable tree mount
'A wand crafted from the branch of a cursed tree.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
